content: the middle east with their Sunni / Shia conflict will be nothing compared to what can happen in this country IF the Hispanics, Blacks, Muslims, Native Americans, and Asia minorities join forces…….Blood will run in the streets ……the first step in taking down a democracy or democratic republic is to destroy the public’s trust in the free media …the voice of the ALT-Right bigots grows louder each day, the longer we tolerate it the closer we are to losing our Country !
